Kemendagri akan Menyelenggarakan Rakornas Forkopimda Pekan depan
05 Nov 2019, 09:08 by Chairul Umam


Kemendagri akan Menyelenggarakan Rakornas Forkopimda Pekan depan

KBRN, Jakarta : Kementerian Dalam Negeri (Kemendagri) diagendakan akan menyelenggarakan Rapat Koordinasi Nasional (Rakornas) Kepala Daerah dan Forum Koordinasi Pimpinan Daerah (Forkopimda) untuk menyamakan Visi Pembangunan 2020 - 2024 pemerintahan Presiden Ir. Joko Widodo dan Wakil Presiden Prof. K.H.Ma'ruf Amin.
Menurut rencana, Rakornas tersebut akan diselenggarakan pada hari Rabu tanggal 13 November 2019 di Sentul International Convention Center (SICC), Bogor, Jawa Barat. Hal itu disampaikan Kepala Pusat Penerangan Kemendagri, Bahtiar di Jakarta, Selasa (05/11/2019).
"Sebagai informasi, nanti tanggal 13 November 2019 di SICC Sentul Bogor, Mendagri akan mengundang semua Gubernur, Walikota/Bupati, Kapolda, Kapolres, Kajati maupun Kajari, Pangdam, Danrem, Dandim serta Ketua DPRD Provinsi, Ketua DPRD Kab/Kota se-Indonesia untuk Rakor tentang Penyamaan Visi Pembangunan 2020 - 2024 ke depan," kata Bahtiar.
Dalam kesempatan tersebut, Presiden Ir. Joko Widodo dan Wapres Prof. K.H. Ma'ruf Amin juga dijadwalkan turut memberikan arahan bersama 4 (Empat) Menteri Koordinator (Menko), Menteri terkait, unsur pengawas, aparat penegak hukum, dan keamanan nasional.
"Akan ada arahan Bapak Presiden dan Bapak Wakil Presiden, para Menko, beberapa Menteri dan Kepala Badan Penanaman Modal, Ketua BPK, Kepala BPKP, Ketua KPK, Jaksa Agung, Kapolri, dan Panglima TNI," jelas Bahtiar yang juga bertindak selaku juru bicara Mendagri.
Mengingat pentingnya acara tersebut sebagai bentuk penyamaan persepsi Visi Pembangunan dan sinkronisasi Pembangunan Pemerintah Pusat dan Pemerintah Daerah, diharapkan seluruh Kepala Daerah dan undangan dapat hadir dan tidak diwakilkan.

The Ministry of Home Affairs will hold the Forkopimda Coordination Meeting next week
05 Nov 2019, 09:08 by Chairul Umam


The Ministry of Home Affairs will hold the Forkopimda Coordination Meeting next week

KBRN, Jakarta: The Ministry of Home Affairs (Kemendagri) is scheduled to hold a National Coordination Meeting (Rakornas) of the Regional Head and a Regional Leadership Coordination Forum (Forkopimda) to equalize the Development Vision 2020-2024 of the government of President Ir. Joko Widodo and Vice President Prof. K.H.Ma'ruf Amin.
According to the plan, the National Coordination Meeting will be held on Wednesday, November 13, 2019 at the Sentul International Convention Center (SICC), Bogor, West Java. This was said by the Head of the Ministry of Home Affairs Information Center, Bahtiar in Jakarta, Tuesday (11/05/2019).
"For information, later on November 13, 2019 at SICC Sentul Bogor, the Minister of Home Affairs will invite all Governors, Mayors / Regents, Kapolda, Kapolres, Kajati and Kajari, Pangdam, Danrem, Dandim and Chairpersons of Provincial DPRDs, Regency / City DPRDs throughout Indonesia for the Coordination Meeting on the Equalization of Development Vision 2020 - 2024 going forward, "said Bahtiar.
On the occasion, President Ir. Joko Widodo and Vice President Prof. K.H. Ma'ruf Amin is also scheduled to take part in giving directives with 4 (four) Coordinating Ministers (Menko), relevant Ministers, supervisory elements, law enforcement officers, and national security.
"There will be directives from the President and Vice President, the Coordinating Ministers, several Ministers and the Head of the Investment Board, the Chairman of the BPK, the Chairman of the BPKP, the Chair of the KPK, the Attorney General, the National Police, and the Armed Forces Commander," explained Bahtiar who also acts as a spokesman for the Minister of Home Affairs .
Considering the importance of the event as a form of unifying perception of the Development Vision and synchronization of Central Government Development and Regional Government, it is hoped that all Regional Heads and invitees can attend and not be represented.
